name: CYBER RUNNER (itch)
description:
E CORP SIMULATIONS INC. PRESENTS

CYBER RUNNER

CONTROLS:

W A S D to walk

LEFT SHIFT to sprint

SPACEBAR to jump

R to restart

ESC to exit

HOW TO PLAY:

RUN from the GRID WALL

JUMP between platforms to reach the ORANGE DOOR

you may need to SPEED UP for some jumps

you may need to SLOW DOWN for some jumps

TIPS:

CLICK the GEAR in the bottom left of the MAIN MENU to change your SETTINGS

IF YOU START THE GAME AND THERE IS NO SOUND, CLICK THE GEAR IN THE BOTTOM LEFT OF THE MAIN MENU AND CHANGE THE VOLUME. THIS IS A KNOWN BUG.

press R to RESTART whenever you want

press R on the MAIN MENU to reset your progress

if you have any ISSUES, please contact the DEVELOPER at y8u332@gmail.com

CREDITS:

BASIC FPS MOVEMENT - http://armedunity.com/ FPS Kit

SOUND EFFECTS - https://www.freesound.org/

GLITCH EFFECT - https://github.com/keijiro/KinoGlitch

CRT SHADER - http://forum.unity3d.com/threads/crt-shader.200726/

FONTS - http://www.dafont.com/
